"Face to Face" is a song recorded by English rock band Siouxsie and the 
Banshees. It was composed by the group along with Danny Elfman and was 
produced by Stephen Hague. The track was featured in the 1992 film, Batman 
Returns, and included on its soundtrack. Elfman also composed the score for the 
film.
